website_summaries.verdict: A great little portable iPhone printer for travel that prints true to original image.
pros: Produces impressive quality prints due to unique dye transfer method
No complaints about color distortion, compared to competing brands
Compact and lightweight at only 8.4 ounces
Uses Bluetooth to print several feet away from your iPhone
Also connects through WiFi, and can even print on an airplane
Loved for how easy it is to use
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Difficult to find refill cartridges online, but consumers were able to order them from local photo shops

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, it won't last a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer a year ago. In terms of performance printing and quality I can say it was OK. Not too great and not too bad, enough to be used on a party. However the reason I DO NOT recommend is because the paper often jammed. It happened so much that the unit broke itself. I cannot longer use it and now I'm stuck with expensive proprietary cartridges that I cannot use on other printers. So there you go, fun product but it breaks easy, it didn't last a single year and I experienced a lot of paper jams problems resulting in a total malfunction... Very sad
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: You can't buy refills!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has fantastic build quality... but even after waiting a month still no cartridges are shipping from any store I've found. I contacted Kodak about the issue, and while they were quick to point out all the listings, every single one is backordered/in preorder/unavailable. When asked about that part they stopped responding to me. Unless you want 10 fantastic wallet sized prints for $10 a piece, buy another pocket printer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Can't find printer refill cartridge easily.  Either backlogged on orders or expensive if you can locate it.
customer_reviews.text: So I love the printer. Too bad you can't get paper all in one printer cartridge refills for it. Have to return this one and the one I got as gift for sister.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lu

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! The quality of the pictures come out really nice. Very easy to use, there are a ton of how to's and reviews on this printer. The only drawback compared to some of the other printers out there is the cartridge that contains the paper is a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Kanno

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy until replacement cartridges are available.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the photos are so so. But the worst part is that replacement cartridges are not available for this model. This product should not be sold until cartridges are available.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: I adore this little printer!
customer_reviews.text: The prints are great 9 times out of 10, I've had a lot of compliments on them. I love the fact that they are stickers if you choose to take the backing off, but you don't have to if you prefer to just have them as photos. I did have to reload the app once already, it acted like it was communicating, but nothing would print. By uninstalling and reinstalling the app on my phone it fixed the problem and life is grand again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures and easy
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of a review that said it was the best in photo quality. I agree. Its easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: madie

customer_reviews.title: The final product is really nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like how you have the choice of several different ways to print images out with this device. You can either just tap your device to the printer in order for your image to print, or, if you're further away, you can just use bluetooth to print it out. Either way, the print comes out fast and the final product is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn S

customer_reviews.title: Internal Printer/Ink Cartridge arrived damaged and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Internal Printer/Ink Cartridge arrived damaged and unusable. Replacement cartridges are not available. Returned purchase as damaged/defective
customer_reviews.author: ChaseTheGreen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great find
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how this little printer was going to work but I am very impressed so far. And when they say the pictures are waterproof that is correct. My husband left 2 pictures in his pocket and I washed them, and the pictures came out of the wash looking good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I gifted it for my friend’s birthday. She really loves it and used it while traveling. When she showed me the photos they are very good quality. And she said she could edit the photos before printing. I feel like I will buy another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: A specialty printer
customer_reviews.text: I realize that the mini pictures and the cartridges are expensive and are more of a novelty or a special use product. That said, I do have a specific need for the convenience of this printer and it worked well except that the last couple of prints would not feed. At nearly $1.00 a print, I didn't want to waste even one. I sent the original printer back and ordered a replacement which had actually gone down $10 in price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Butt

customer_reviews.title: Happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived safe safe and sound everything was working perfectly but I do suggest that you buy a Kodak mini cartridge because my printer didn’t come with one so I suggest buying one before hand. The pictures come out clearly and a very precise no problems.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Finally ... A Better Alternative to Zink Pinters
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a better quality portable printer for use in my journal while traveling. The poor quality prints from my Zink paper HP Sprocket has been making me crazy. So happy to have found the Kodak. The prints are far better, as they lay down CMY colors (like the Canon Selphy). It’s not a 5 star print by any means ... it tends to crush the shadows and blow the highlights, but the colors are truer and for a portable 2x3 print solution, it’s a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Nice pictures
customer_reviews.text: **Update** So I went to use my printer and it’s all of a sudden not working. I’ve been using it every month to print out mini pic to paste in my baby’s photo album book. I ended up opening another cartridge, thinking that it was the cartridge but it wasn’t. I’m totally disappointed and wish I could just get my money back. I now have to get in contact to with Kodak to try and resolve the issue. Not happy at all!!!!! I absolutely love the printer! The only reason I didn’t give it 5stars is due to the fact it did not come with the 8free prints. Luckily I purchased the 3pack.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Zah

customer_reviews.title: Yes, some pictures can be dark, but it is still a good product
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our kids to make a scrapbook while on vacation. It works well and is easy to use. Yes, some pictures can come out a little dark, but if you just edit/lighten them a little before printing, they look great. Plus, if you get extra cartridges for the Kodak Mini 2, the pictures print on photo paper with a sticky back, making it easy to put in a scrapbook without the need for glue. It connects easily to your phone through the app, and the pictures print quickly. The charging cable is a micro USB to USB, making it easy to connect to other devices/adapters for charging.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: No printer paper All of items and the item itself were just tossed in the box . Only things in my box were a printer, usb cord ,pens, carrying case a pink mini photo album that was stamped POLARIOD , picture decorating stickers that looked like left overs from some other box . The directions were so small that I had to go to a third party video to follow Im humiliated by MY mistake . Disgusted with the seller. When a third party is involved as the seller your buying a third party quality control item.I’m sure Kodak home based customer service department would be shocked
customer_reviews.author: One Eyed Blond

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer for a while now but it has recently proved its worth by helping me out of a bind when I needed ID pictures quickly but there was no way to get one. Had a mate take a picture of me standing in front of a wall then some editing and the end result looked good enough to be put on an official document.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It quit working after about 50 pics. Chewed through the not cheap print catridges and now I cannot return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Smith Mount

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed fine on arrival, app install and printer link are super easy. That had me very excited about future use with this printer except the printer would never print its first photo. It jammed every single time, printed 10 times on 3 different carriage. returned
customer_reviews.author: Timo606

customer_reviews.title: Cellophane defects
customer_reviews.text: Cellophane in cartridges jam pretty easy and no other option than to replace, which ultimately is very expensive. The cartridge already installed as in poor condition and had to replace from the start. Good concept but need major improvements or price much lower.
customer_reviews.author: ACM

customer_reviews.title: simply not good
customer_reviews.text: the printer is simply not good : 1. low quality pictures 2.Only one device can be connected at the same time. you need to disconnect one device before connecting other 3.Although in the product page ther is a video showing that the printer page is a sticker, the printer pages are not actually a sticker and the seller is actually misrepresenting
customer_reviews.author: boaz

customer_reviews.title: The best quality mini printer seen.
customer_reviews.text: The print quality is really good for this mini size printer. I have a bunch of those credit card size photos on my office desk and my room. It obviously & definitely much better than the same brand PRINTOMATIC using ZINK print media. Yes it is bit heavy but I dont really bring it out all the time so doesnt coz any problem to me. Just a little bit practical using experience that the android app connection lost when the printer timeout and wake up again. Not a big deal but still hope it can be better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: I literally JUST GOT THIS today. I bought this so I could print pictures of my baby and this is how they came out. One of them made my child look like demon and the last one to come out pulled out the film with it. Now there is film caught in my device and I can’t fit anything in there to pull it out. Also, I bought this device with the extra 30 film but didn’t receive it. I only got 10 films that were already in the cartridge. Luckily I bought the warranty so HOPEFULLY the next one they send me works correctly and they don’t forget to send me the extra 30 film that I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond V.

customer_reviews.title: By far better than the others
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before deciding on this one for my daughter for her birthday. It came quickly and was exactly as described and well packaged. She has been super happy with it. She loves all the little pics she can print at the drop of a hat. The color quality is great which was the main reason I chose this specific printer. I would say you still should brighten your photos before printing because they do have a darker tint on paper than they do on your device. But it’s so much better than what I hear with other similar printers. Everything about this little printer was perfect. Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Sanders

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made so far in 2019!
customer_reviews.text: I love polaroids, and have been a die hard fan, but the downside is that I can't always take a picture of something to instantly print. WIth this bad boy, I can search through my photo gallery, facebook, or even instagram to print pictures. I can decorate them as well with the function offered. I also enjoy watching the layers of each print. I have also found that the pictures iteself are the biggest compared with other portable devices such as HP Sprocket, or the Canon Ivy. And its very easy to simply take out and put in a new cartridge eveytime it needs a refill. And all pictures are sticker type as well. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jei

customer_reviews.title: Great print quality
customer_reviews.text: Print quality is better than another popular brand I returned that uses the z ink. I don’t mind waiting a few seconds for the image to print.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and ease of use. Only drawback I can see is that my Bluetooth needs to be reconnected constantly. I hope doneday they’ll make one that does larger size photos/stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rucano

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Compact. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! I rarely ever have problems with it! There was one issue that I believe was entirely my fault, DO NOT pull on the picture as its printing. I know that should be a given, but I had a moment and ruined an entire printing cartridge! It is difficult to find refillable for this, so make sure to triple check that you are getting the right size papers for it! I spent $50 on the wrong papers once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. Used two papers to print one pic. The pic was in horrible quality. Customer Service made me pay for shipping and asked for restocking fee adding up to 30$, the product is 50$. I emailed, they responded late, but sent a code to make it free. Two weeks has passed, still no refund. Horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: y.k.

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I have had an absolute blast with this printer. We were looking at getting an instant camera when we came across this and realized this was about the same. The prints are not super high quality but for what we are using them for they are perfect. My teenage daughter has used the prints for decorating her binders/folders for school so she's in love. It's a cute little compact printer with the ability to print from anywhere as long as you have the app on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: It was worth the risk
customer_reviews.text: I read both positive & negative reviews and decided that I would give it a shot. Works great! I have not had any jamming issues, but I am still on the original set of photo paper that came with it. The colors are good and I am pleased with the quality. The app was easy to install and get going. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyCouponMom

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I THOUGHT I WOULD LOVE THIS PRODUCT, PRINT MY OWN PICS INSTEAD OF MAILING THEM OFF SOMEWHERE, SAVE ME SOME MONEY, BUT I WAS WRONG. EVERY TIME I USE THIS PRODUCT IT TAKES AT LEAST 5-6 TIMES FOR A SINGLE PICTURE TO PRINT. THIS HAS HAPPENED EVERY TIME I'VE GONE TO USE IT. THINKING OF RETURNING IT. WHEN IT DOES WORK, IT'S GREAT, GOOD PICTURE QUALITY, COLOR, BUT IT JUST TAKES FOREVER IN THE BEGINNING TO GET IT GOING. SO FRUSTRATING.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn M Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality photos & you’ll replace ink a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. 1. Pictures look dark.. unlike the actual photo taken that’s stored on my phone. 2. I had to replace ink cartridge and haven’t even printed 10 photos yet. I bought this for convenience and simplicity but it’s the opposite. I feel like I wasted a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the size. Very easy to use. Easy to install the app. Can use pictures from gallery or camera. Pictures are clear and can be edited. Great for scrapbooking and sharing photos. The size makes it easily portable and it works through Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Portable and great pics!
customer_reviews.text: I have the polaroid zip and the quality isn't that great, I've seen the printouts for the Kodak and loved the quality and so I decided to purchase this during Christmas in July "Prime Day" and so happy with the price and quality of the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Claudie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is sadly the first negative review I’ve had to give on Amazon. This product works well and does what it’s supposed to be not in good quality picture. The picture is the about 3 inches in length and even from far away you can tell it’s not clear. It’s much smarter to save your money and go to the local pharmacy down the street and print your pictures full size for $0.15 a piece in clear picture
customer_reviews.author: Karen Horton

customer_reviews.title: The paper IS NOT PEEL AND STICK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so frustrated. I bought this specifically because I read that the paper is peel and stick. Even the manufacturer responded to questions confirming these are peel and stick, but they are normal photo paper and I've ruined two pictures trying to get the back off. False advertising! I had a whole project planned that won't work because they DON'T PEEL AND STICK. I'm using the cartridges that came with the printer so I know it's not something I'm doing wrong.
customer_reviews.author: jen moh

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy and quick printing
customer_reviews.text: This printing technology won't require masters degree for you to set it up. Really great for someone who had abslolutely minimal skills like myself. Connectivity is through wifi or bluetooth. The device functions pretty well. It works perfect when the image is taken outdoors where good lighting is.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: It’d be nice if it turned on?!?
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT TURN ON?! Charged it for 5 hours- didn’t turn on. Charged overnight- still doesn’t turn on. Had 2 other electronic savvy colleagues look at it and Nothing!!! & I need it for my event tomorrow!!! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RacerX112

customer_reviews.title: Having so much fun with this printer
customer_reviews.text: Love this little printer. Great for those school projects. Love that the pictures can be stuck anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Credit Card Sized Photos
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! I just printed a picture of my youngest niece and it’s just as sharp imaged as a regular size picture. I was apprehensive since someone said the colored ones didn’t work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I could not even get this thing to print. it jammed everytime. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Blondy’s Boutique

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This little printer is great. I had to hide it from my daughter and mother cause they were going crazy printing out a bunch of pics. I love the size of the pictures and I absolutely love that they double as stickers (and their even waterproof). It's size is great to take on trips and it doesn't take long to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: KODAK MINI IS AN AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: So GLAD to find this fabulous little printer! And the KODAK quality is unprecedented! This printer is fun and I take it everywhere! You will have fun making little memories. Make a garland of pics for your Christmas tree! Photos are of SUPERIOR QUALITY. And the price is affordable. A must have for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer was very easy to set up, load the cartridge, and paper. The pictures are very clear. We ordered additional paper with the cartridges at the same time since the printer only comes with eight pieces of paper ( non-stick). Love it. would recommend to anyone. We also ordered the carrying case for easier transport.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with defective product :(
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it was defective right out of the box. I got the 'replace cartridge' error from the very beginning (even after replacing with a brand new cartridge), the printer jammed during print a couple times requiring me to reset it. I was able to print about 10 photos between all the errors and issues, but I was really disappointed with the print quality. High resolution images were blurry, especially faces.
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Kristine Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Love thsi mini printer
customer_reviews.text: Needed this printer in a pinch. Old one stopped working a week before a Community Safety Day at our local PD. Super fast shipping got it to me in time allowing me to quicky snap/print photos to give to attendees. App very easy to use & photo color/composition/quality great. Kids loved watching it "develop" right before their eyes. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: zwirnergirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good quality prints.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my 19 year old. Initial set up took about 5 minutes, including downloading the app to her phone. The prints are amazing quality and fun to watch the “stages of printing”.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Beware of seller
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. The seller sent me an opened/previously used printer; it was missing photo paper and 1 cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Winters

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 14 photos cant get it to come out or print. The yellow tint stuff just crumpled on the last picture and there is no trouble le shooting instructions says call a number if resetting don't work and I did and still it does not work I will never buy another mini printer again.
customer_reviews.author: MICKI FARNHAM

customer_reviews.title: Makes clear and bright prints
customer_reviews.text: I travel quite a bit and thought that this would be useful to carry around as well as make my experiences more memorable, so I made the purchase. Safe to say, I'm nothing short of incredibly satisfied. Clear and bright prints
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cool unit
customer_reviews.text: Portable little unit! I like how the cartridges replace the paper and ink. This is a small light portable unit that can be taken just about anywhere in a pack or bag. Shipping was fast and everything showed up as advertised! Picture quality is pretty good - Photos are 2X3 in
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Best photo printer for your phone
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this printer. Excellant picture quality.It's Kodak you know it's going to be good.I use it to get pictures off my phone makes wallet size pictures.easy to use it works using bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: richard metzler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer and was excited when it arrived. I charged it up, and it wouldn’t print. I went through the FAQ s and finally decided it needed to be replaced. I returned it to Amazon and quickly got a replacement. This one worked. Printed beautiful photos. Then the paper jammed. And there was no way to open the paper door with it jammed. The plastic broke when I tried to open it. I was fed up and threw it away. I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Charlene Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sad little girl for Christmas.If I could give zero stars I would. Got the printer and never even worked not even once. Contacted customer support who could not help. Customer support said they would send a replacement. Still have not gotten the replacement and I got the printer almost a month ago. Save your $100.00 and order something else.
customer_reviews.author: kristi taylor

customer_reviews.title: Mini 2 printer by Kodak
customer_reviews.text: My kids sent me this Birthday. I was amazed the pictures came out of printer. Works well with Bluetooth on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Koslouski

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those quick prints that you want to share with everyone! Definitely a little more costly because it's about $10 every cartridge. But definitely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute pictures
customer_reviews.text: No,they aren't crystal clear, but they're perfect for a scrapbook/journal/planner. Took me a bit to figure out how to edit the pictures, but otherwise, it was easy to use from the get-go. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pip

customer_reviews.title: Bad Seller
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged and seller told me I couldn’t receive a full refund because I had opened it. The printer simply does not work. It connects to my phone and then simply does not print. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Martine

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: We reviewed several makes before purchasing this one. Very easy setup and print/picture quality is very good. We are traveling to India and wanted a portable photo printer so we could print pictures of people we're visiting to give to them right from our cell phones. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. Ordered it early for her birthday March 29th. Gave it to her on her birthday.. doesn't even work. The paper gets jammed and then destroys the whole cartridge. Still has yet to even print one picture.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine crow

customer_reviews.title: Pictures a bit darker than expected, but great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful and handy product to have. Very quick prints and easy to connect to phone. Pictures are smaller than I expected, but still very clear. The color comes out a little darker than I anticipated. Overall a great product and perfect for small quick pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not sticker paper
customer_reviews.text: I have one major issues with this product and that is that the paper is not sticker paper. It refers to sticker paper in the video as well as the Q&A sect but I peeled several of the photos and found nothing. Very disappointed. That was the main reason for the purchase. I can’t even find any cartridges that say it is sticker paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2ND TIME BUYING - No use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas and she is able to print one picture and then it breaks. We connect it to her phone, charge it and do not touch anything. All we do is try to get a picture to print out and it refuses. After we get the one picture out the ink will jam and we can no longer use it. We tried printing simple pictures with barely any color and it still jams. I do not recommend this product and very irritated by both printers doing the same exact thing. She only got to get one picture out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Norton

customer_reviews.title: it won't work -WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: this thing gets stuck at every-single-print. I followed recommendations of resetting the unit at every other print, and didn't work. I started doing it after every print.. and still won't print right. the paper keeps getting stuck. I cannot even get the cartridge out from the last print because the paper is impeding it form coming out. WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all, big sad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and from the very first use this printer didn't work. The paper would jam on the first run every time, and the printer would shut itself off. It seemed like a cool product until it didn't work. I also unfortunately purchased multiple refills of paper as well which ended up being wasted trying to get the printer to work in the first place. This was a very unfortunate experience. Would not recommend. Pretty colors tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a Christmas gift. Picture quality is suitable for her. Everything in the bundle was excellent. Only thing that was a waste of money is the markers. They don't work on the paper. The maker set states that it works best with Zink paper. This printer doesn't use Zink Paper. Case that came was not the color pictured. It was a weird denim color. Despite that the printer fits in it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Just print a pics for the ones you Love
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, has different frame designs to choose from in the app, print picture right away to give to your family & Friends. We are having a wonderful time printing photo's on the Spot! No more sending Photo's to our Family & Friends and the Photo's just set there and you Forget about them. Best Product to buy to share with Family & Friends. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Walter L Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Wow,
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect the quality of picture that this system puts out. Print right from my Iphone so easy. No CON, all PRO this just works way better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Feral

customer_reviews.title: Make clear number of photos and provide frame options
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if there were mini-frames that would fit these. You can get them, but you have to cut the photos as they are irregularly sized. Even magnet photo frames would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: G Force

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with the 2bd one..
customer_reviews.text: I got my new one and still nit happy with it. Paper always get stuck. If I could return this one I would not happy with this little picture printer......
customer_reviews.author: Krista Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Cool accessories
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter was is starting Baylor in the fall. She absolutely lives all the different accessories that it comes with. She can’t wait to start snapping pics of her college experiences and decorating her dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Newton

customer_reviews.title: I bought new printer and got a used one!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the printer was used. Not only has an empty cartridge but also the USB cable is broken and printer has some scratches on its body. I have to be very kind when writing a review in order to be posted, this is Amazon Community rules!!
customer_reviews.author: Qutaim M. Al Osaimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pictures
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini printer!!! It uses ink to print and I have to do very little adjustments to my pictures. They come out like they were taken.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. Wells

customer_reviews.title: I love this little printer ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little printer. A little noisy when printing but not annoying at all. Very compact and convenient to take anywhere! Great photo color quality. Highly recommend ♥️ ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Donna Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little printer. I bought it because I have so many pictures on my phone and tablet that I wanted to print out. This doesn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Jharbolt

customer_reviews.title: Good Printer
customer_reviews.text: It does what it advertises, it prints pretty good small photos which I find helpful for my scrapbooking. Quality is good as long as you don't pass the photo size limit. Also for other comments I've seen about paper jams, that's the thing its a PRINTER and all PRINTERS get paper jams and not that hard to fix. I would recommend buying this, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: (✿´‿`)

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy and don’t trust seller
customer_reviews.text: Tried to print one picture and it asked for a new cartridge. I’m expected to pay for shipping back. Don’t order from this person. Horrible experience and a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: It prints good. Wish the picture was a little bit bigger. Also it shows in the video that the film after it’s developed the back peels off and becomes a sticker. I could not get it to be a sticker at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun, easy.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use. Play with picture settings to get the print you want. Prints super fast. Like 30 seconds maybe? The print quality could use improvement but overall it’s fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: ME!!!

customer_reviews.title: Does the job ok
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use. I wish the picture quality was a little bit better and they need to work on the app. but great
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Scoresby

customer_reviews.title: Works well..but tiny pictures
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews and this. Was misleading saying it prints larger than the normal 2 x 3 ..it is a very tiny print...
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pics on demand
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. Set up in minutes, and I am very impressed by the print quality. A great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The printer itself works wonderfully and prints amazing pictures. I bought one for my girlfriend and it glitched but after a reset it was brand new. I think more detailed instructions should be added but other than that It is a good product and well worth its price.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTheGamer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: She'll bankrupt me buying print paper, but her smile makes it all worth it. Good product, Great Seller - Recommend especially for pre-teen, and teenagers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat device!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures print in decent quality but the printer dies very quickly and the paper is quite expensive to only print 8 little credit card sized photos. But it’s convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kirklin

customer_reviews.title: Mini 2 Kodak printer
customer_reviews.text: Bought Kodak Mini 2 on Amazon. Great price, excellent product, have and will recommend to family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri

customer_reviews.title: Recipient really enjoys this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for family member with young grandchildren who love to have their pictures taken.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get paper so we had to return. My daughter was highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing printer, wouldn’t connect
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using this printer to quickly print photos of my newborn. Unfortunately, the printer would shut off mid-print every time I tried printing a picture. After several failed attempts at maintain the Bluetooth connection, I returned the printer. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: BlearyEyed

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love it..... especially all the extras they are so neat the stickers the backgrounds I love them all ....

customer_reviews.title: Great little pictures
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and good quality pictures . I’m use it with PicJoiner app and am really happy with the results. Very small and portable

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little printer! Works great for what I wanted it for.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just link to cell phone and print good pictures good color for credit card size pictures

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. Bought 3 packages of film after replacing the first purchased printer. After 12 uses this printer is eating cartridges. If I could give it 0 stars I would. Don't waste your time.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Only printed about 10 photos. But this little thing is great. Gift for god daughter. Quality is what’s expected for this size machine. I’m happy with it.

product_meta.title: Kodak Mini 2 HD Wireless Portable Mobile Instant Photo Printer, Print Social Media Photos, Premium Quality Full Color Prints – Compatible w/iOS & Android Devices (White)
product_meta.description: Color:White| Size:BasicEffortless printing for your most precious moments. Wish you could use or Share your photos on your phone Without visiting a photo shop? The photo printer Mini 2 by Kodak is here to set you free. Just tap your Android device on the surface of the printer, and innovative NFC one touch has you editing and printing in an instant. Or use the Bluetooth connection on either your Android or iOS device to send photos wirelessly. The all-in-one ink and paper cartridge produces stunningly detailed credit card-sized photos perfect for your wallet. All photos are printed on waterproof and fingerprint proof paper with an extra protective layer to ensure lasting image quality. Best of all, access tons of editing features via the free Kodak app, including cropping, collage, special ID print, and more. Real ink. In an instant. . The Kodak Mini 2 printer leverages patented 4pass printing technology, also known as dye-sublimation, resulting in beautiful, high-quality prints. It features the world’s smallest 4pass all-in-one cartridge for carrying convenience and unmatched quality. What you get 1 Kodak photo printer Mini 2 1 micro USB cable> quick start Guide> all in one cartridge with 8-photo capacity Specs & Details photo Size: 2. 1”X3. 4” (credit card) BR> dimensions: 3. 0”Wx5. 2”Lx1”d (78. 2 x 132. 4 x 25. 4Mm) weighs in at 8. 4oz (238g) main connection: Wi-Fi Direct NFC & Bluetooth> input: Micro USB port for charging> battery: 620 mAh lithium polymer (not removable> charge time: 1. 5 hours> prints per charge: 20 print time: about 50 seconds> printing method: dye sublimation thermal transfer> gradation: 256 gradations/16. 7 million colors> app available via Google Play & app Store> compatible ink cartridges: mc-20, mc-30, mc-50 colors: Black, White
feature_bullets: Easy print technology – mini smartphone printer lets you print 2. 1 x 3. 4” photos direct from Android or iOS device; No cables or buttons necessary
Wireless connectivity – NFC one touch for Android Launches Kodak app to print in seconds; also compatible with iOS/Android via Bluetooth
HIGH QUALITY PHOTOS – Innovative 4 PASS D2T2 Dye Transfer Method Produces Beautiful, Detailed Black/White or Color Portraits That Dry Instantly & Stay Bright Up to 10 Yrs
All-in-one Convenience – innovative Kodak MC Cartridges combine paper & color ink for easy maintenance; purchase Refills in increments of 20, 30 or 50
Free companion app – download the Kodak photo Printer app for filters, Cropping, stickers, card Templates, ID photo print, video & SNS print & More
